captionText: Fashion is what you buy. Style is what you do with it.
author: Unknown

captionText: Dress like you're already famous.
author: Unknown

captionText: Fashion is about dressing according to what's fashionable. Style is more about being yourself.
author: Oscar de la Renta

captionText: You can have anything you want in life if you dress for it.
author: Edith Head

captionText: Fashion is the armor to survive the reality of everyday life.
author: Bill Cunningham

captionText: A woman's dress should be like a barbed-wire fence: serving its purpose without obstructing the view.
author: Sophia Loren

captionText: The joy of dressing is an art.
author: John Galliano

captionText: Fashion is what you're offered four times a year by designers. And style is what you choose.
author: Lauren Hutton

captionText: Style is a way to say who you are without having to speak.
author: Rachel Zoe

captionText: Fashion is like eating. You shouldn't stick with the same menu.
author: Kenzo Takada

captionText: Fashion is very important. It is life-enhancing and, like everything that gives pleasure, it is worth doing well.
author: Vivienne Westwood

captionText: I don't design clothes. I design dreams.
author: Ralph Lauren

captionText: Playing dress-up begins at age five and never truly ends.
author: Kate Spade

captionText: I don't do fashion. I am fashion.
author: Coco Chanel

captionText: Clothes mean nothing until someone lives in them.
author: Marc Jacobs

captionText: Elegance is elimination.
author: Cristóbal Balenciaga
